titleStmt.title: The Day-breaking, if not the sun-rising of the Gospell with the Indians in New-England
titleStmt.author: Wilson, John, 1588-1667.
Shepard, Thomas, 1605-1649.
Eliot, John, 1604-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Rich. Cotes for Fulk Clifton ...,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to John Wilson, John Eliot and Thomas Shepard. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); BM.; Wing. For a discussion of the question of authorship, see Proceedings of the Massachusetts Historical Society, 1890/91, v. 26 (2nd ser., v. 6) p. 392-395.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
